additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Zinc Carbonate, Glycol Distearate, Cocamide MEA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Zinc Pyrithione, Fragrance, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-10, Stearyl Alcohol, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone

additionalProperty.name: Warning
